issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: *Assessment* Used euca-bundle-instance on QA cloud, and the following error returned: {code} # euca-bundle-instance -b ubuntu-trusty-x86-64-mysql-zfs-20160131-hvm -p ubuntu-trusty-x86_64-mysql-zfs-hvm -o AKIAAGRVSLCEK6Z5KOUI -w zQgGk9XldzGBvE52ADMjhSWN5zQMeCmvrG24yjJ i-FD6DC2C6 --region devops-admin@ euca-bundle-instance: error (InvalidParameterValue): Value for UploadPolicySignature is invalid. {code} *Signs* * Version of Eucalyptus/Euca2ools ** eucalyptus - 4.2.1-0.0.24116.75.20151124git2cab29b.el6 ** euca2ools - 3.3.0-0.0.1740.3.el6 * Command executed with fields.summary: BundleInstance fails - returns UploadPolicySignature is invalid

comments.body: Please try to reproduce and if found, assign to [~vasya].

[~vasya],

I confirmed this issue on the QA cloud.  Information below:
{code}
# euca-describe-instances i-FD6DC2C6 --region devops-admin@
RESERVATION	r-57B22699	592529130935	default
INSTANCE	i-FD6DC2C6	emi-F86ECC5F	euca-10-111-4-20.eucalyptus.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-54-104.eucalyptus.internal	running	devops-admin	0		m3.xlarge	2016-01-30T21:54:51.088Z	production				monitoring-disabled	10.111.4.20	10.111.54.104			instance-store					hvm			sg-65313D65				x86_64
TAG	instance	i-FD6DC2C6	application	mysql-server
TAG	instance	i-FD6DC2C6	euca:node	10.111.1.192

# euca-bundle-instance -b ubuntu-trusty-x86-64-mysql-zfs-20160131-hvm -p ubuntu-trusty-x86_64-mysql-zfs-hvm -o AKIAAGRVSLCEK6Z5KOUI -w zQgGk9XldzGBvE52ADMjhSWN5zQMeCmvrG24yjJ i-FD6DC2C6 --region devops-admin@
euca-bundle-instance: error (InvalidParameterValue): Value for UploadPolicySignature is invalid.
{code}

Contents of .euca/devops-admin.ini
{code}
# cat .euca/devops-admin.ini
[global]
default-region = cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com

[user 592529130935:devops-admin]
account-id = 592529130935
secret-key = 3zQgGk9XldzGBvE52ADMjhSWN5zQMeCmvrG24yjJ
key-id = AKIAAGRVSLCEK6Z5KOUI

[region cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com]
iam-url = http://iam.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
reporting-url = http://reporting.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
ec2-url = http://ec2.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
s3-url = http://s3.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
elasticloadbalancing-url = http://elasticloadbalancing.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
bootstrap-url = http://bootstrap.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
autoscaling-url = http://autoscaling.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
cloudformation-url = http://cloudformation.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
monitoring-url = http://monitoring.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
sts-url = http://sts.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
properties-url = http://properties.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
{code}

Let me know if there are any questions.
[~hspencer], the secret key used for the euca-bundle-instance command is not correct in your comment (should start with "3")

[~sjones], good call.  I totally missed that.  I tried it again with the correct secret key, and it worked.
{code}
[root@g-19-12 ~]# euca-bundle-instance -b ubuntu-trusty-x86-64-mysql-zfs-20160131-hvm -p ubuntu-trusty-x86_64-mysql-zfs-hvm -o AKIAAGRVSLCEK6Z5KOUI -w 3zQgGk9XldzGBvE52ADMjhSWN5zQMeCmvrG24yjJ i-FD6DC2C6 --region devops-admin@
BUNDLE	bun-FD6DC2C6	i-FD6DC2C6	ubuntu-trusty-x86-64-mysql-zfs-20160131-hvm	ubuntu-trusty-x86_64-mysql-zfs-hvm	2016-02-12T03:55:36.327Z	2016-02-12T03:55:36.327Z	pending	0	ubuntu-trusty-x86-64-mysql-zfs-20160131-hvm/ubuntu-trusty-x86_64-mysql-zfs-hvm.manifest.xml
[root@g-19-12 ~]# euca-describe-bundle-tasks --region devops-admin@
BUNDLE	bun-FD6DC2C6	i-FD6DC2C6	ubuntu-trusty-x86-64-mysql-zfs-20160131-hvm	ubuntu-trusty-x86_64-mysql-zfs-hvm	2016-02-12T03:55:36.327Z	2016-02-12T03:56:34.914Z	storing	55	ubuntu-trusty-x86-64-mysql-zfs-20160131-hvm/ubuntu-trusty-x86_64-mysql-zfs-hvm.manifest.xml
....
[root@g-19-12 ~]# euca-describe-bundle-tasks --region devops-admin@
BUNDLE	bun-FD6DC2C6	i-FD6DC2C6	ubuntu-trusty-x86-64-mysql-zfs-20160131-hvm	ubuntu-trusty-x86_64-mysql-zfs-hvm	2016-02-12T03:55:36.327Z	2016-02-12T03:56:54.738Z	complete	100	ubuntu-trusty-x86-64-mysql-zfs-20160131-hvm/ubuntu-trusty-x86_64-mysql-zfs-hvm.manifest.xml
# euca-register -n ubuntu-trusty-x86-64-mysql-zfs-hvm ubuntu-trusty-x86-64-mysql-zfs-20160131-hvm/ubuntu-trusty-x86_64-mysql-zfs-hvm.manifest.xml --virtualization-type hvm --region devops-admin@
IMAGE	emi-C6C27AE8
{code}
